= 81321 |area_code = 970 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 08-17375 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 0179044 |website = City of Cortez |footnotes = }} Cortez is a Home Rule Municipality that is the county seat and the most populous municipality of Montezuma County, Colorado, United States. The city population was 8,766 at the 2020 United States Census. ==References== Category:Cities in Colorado Category:County seats in Colorado
